title: Cult Founder

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Brainwash a player into the Cult.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Players brainwashed by you will join your Cult, regardless of role unless they have won or are immune to conversion, and become a Cultist.
Neutral (Evil) players turn into kill-capable Cultists.
Cultists have no ability, but may continue to fake it if they were in a scumchat prior.
All Cultists are Lovers, if one dies, all of the current living Cultists die.
Cultists win with you and each other.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Bring all living players into the Cult.

desc:
Post 4789
*" And thus, the story began anew. "*
